msg.stackpack.packer.error.inoffhand: Packers can only be used in your main hand.
msg.stackpack.packer.configureinfo: To configure the packer, place an item or block in your offhand, then re-use the packer.
msg.stackpack.packer.error.hasnbt: For now, the packer cannot work with items/blocks that store NBT data.
msg.stackpack.packer.error.notempty: You cannot perform this operation on a non-empty packer.
